about_the_game:
Welcome to the Galaxy Dreamer page - an old-school space shooter that will remind you of your childhood.

Game Features

Gameplay: 2D Top down Shoot'em Up, where you control a spaceship and shoot opponents.

Several game modes: Company, Arcade, Random Run, Boss Rush.

- Company mode: story levels that can be completed separately.

- Arcade mode: story levels are sequential, and between them you can choose upgrades for your ship.

- Random Run: arcade levels with random opponents.

- Challenges: separate levels with unique game mechanics, boss battles and just additions to the main company.

Unlockable content:

- the ability to upgrade your ship;

- 8 types of unique ships with special attacks;

- more than a dozen unique weapons that will help you deal with enemies.

Local co-op: you can shoot opponents together with a friend or friends (up to 4 people)!

Challenges: separate levels with unique game mechanics, boss battles and just additions to the main company.

A large number of different opponents that will create problems for you!

Bosses, each of whom is ready to show you what pain is.

Several dozen cool soundtracks that will not let you get bored during the game.

name: Galaxy Dreamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Galaxy Dreamer is an 2D old-school vertical space shooter that will remind you of your childhood.Сontrol a spaceship and shoot your opponents alone or with a friend! You can choose from a dozen spaceships and weapons to destroy a variety of enemies and BOSSES!
